name: Luna Dei
description:
Made for the 2020 Lunar New Year Jam. For the theme of the jam, I interpreted it as a creator living on a moon changing the course of a nearby planet's history. Prepare your people for the looming threat that is destined to destroy your world. I created all the assets for this project. 

Controls: A/D Movement, E Interact

Tools: GameMaker Studio 1.4, Audacity
Soundtrack

Thanks for playing!
